item.title: k8s in action 阅读笔记
item.description: 如何保证多次请求命中同一个pod？ If you execute the same command a few more times, you should hit a different pod with every invocation, because the service proxy normally forwards each connection to a randomly selected backing pod, even if the connections are coming from the same client.
